English:
Reduces damage taken by 20% of damage received (excluding Speed attribute, up to a maximum of 30%). 
When taking action or if this debuff is reapplied during its duration, the reduction resets.
Chinese:
依据受到伤害的20%提升减少量(不包括速度属性，且至多减少至30%)。
行动时或持续时间内被再次施加此减益时，减少量重置。

English: After using &a skills in hand other than [Princess Summon], generate 1 [Princess Summon] with Exclude, discarded after 1 turn.
Chinese: 使用&a张手中除【公主召唤】以外的技能后，生成1张【公主召唤】，附带放逐，1回合后弃牌。

English: After receiving 2 (&b/2) Follow-up attacks/counterattacks, take &a damage.
Chinese: 每受到2（&b/2）次追加攻击/反击后，受到&a点伤害。

English:
After &a turns, choose to generate 1 rare skill of self with Exclude. 
When this buff is reapplied, restore 1 Mana and reduce the required time to generate the skill by 1 turn. 
Removed after generating the skill.
Chinese:
&a回合后，可选择生成1张自身的稀有技能，附带放逐。
被再次施加本增益时，恢复1点法力值，缩短1回合生成技能所需时间。
生成技能后解除。

English: Every 4 (&b/4) standby counts (not counted when ending the turn), cast [Destruction Spell] on the enemy with the highest HP and generate &a Barrier.
Chinese: 每经过4（&b/4）个倒计时（按下回合结束键后不计入），对体力值最高的敌人释放1次【破坏法术】，并生成&a点防护墙。

English: For each stack of this buff, increase damage dealt by 1 when using skill attacks.
Chinese: 自身释放技能攻击时，每有1层此增益，造成的伤害增加1点。

English: If we're together, we can do anything!
Chinese: 如果两个人在一起的话！

English:
Gain 1 stack of [Bond Sigil] for each buff received, lasting 2 turns. 

[Bond Sigil]: +2% Critical Rate per stack. For each stack, increase damage dealt by 1 when using skill attacks. 

The maximum stacks of [Bond Sigil] are equal to self's level ×2.
Chinese:
每受到1次增益，自身获得1层【友情魔印】，持续2回合。

友情魔印：暴击率+2%/层，自身释放技能攻击时，每有1层此增益，造成的伤害增加1点。

【友情魔印】的上限层数为自身等级*2。

English:
The twin princesses of Manaria who unleash combos through Mana Resonance. 

Gaining [Bond Sigil] stacks from buffs will enhance skills, allowing them to strike enemies with a fiery magic spear charged for a critical hit.
Chinese:
以魔力共鸣使出连击的玛纳利亚双姝。

得到增益效果时，增加的【友情魔印】将强化技能，使出蓄势重击的炎之魔枪讨伐敌人。
英灵啊，回应我的呼唤吧！

English: Seeing fire helps me calm down a bit.
Chinese: 看到火，我就能稍微冷静下来呢。

English: Hey? Aren't we going to attack?
Spirit Spear, pierce through the enemies!
No matter what enemies we face, we won't lose!
Chinese: 不管遇到怎样的敌人，我们都不会输！

English: I'm not as smart as Anne, so I need to study hard.
Chinese: 我没有安那么聪明，所以要认真学习才行。

English: What should I do with Grea? ♪
Chinese: 要和古蕾雅一起做些什么好呢♪
比起“永别”，我们更愿意听到你说“再见”呢。

English: Now it's three versus three, Lucy!
Darn, both of them got controlled!
Chinese: 可恶，竟然两个人都被控制了！

English: If we share the burden together, it's nothing!
Chinese: 两人一起分担的话就不算什么！

English: Wow. This is double the pain!
Chinese: 哇。这岂不是双倍的痛苦！

English:
Deal &a damage 2 times. 
Reduces own Overload by 1.
Chinese:
造成&a点伤害2次。
使自身过载-1。

English:
Deal &a damage 2 times. 
Reduces own Overload by 1. 
Can be used again this turn.
Chinese:
造成&a点伤害2次。
使自身过载-1。
可在本回合内再次使用。

English:
If no skills in hand have been used this turn, reduce this skill's cost by 1. 
During this skill's standby count, for each standby count elapsed (not counted when ending the turn), deal &a damage to all enemies.
Chinese:
本回合若没有使用过任何手中的技能，则此技能费用减少1点。
此技能倒计时期间，每经过1个倒计时（按下回合结束键后不计入），对所有敌人造成&a点伤害。

English:
During this skill's standby count, after an ally is attacked, &target counterattacks with &b damage. 
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/5):</color> Release with standby count 3.
Chinese:
此技能倒计时期间，友军受到攻击后，&target以&b点伤害反击。
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/5）：</color>以‘倒计时3’释放。

English:
If there are other enemies with a standby count difference of 1 or less from the target, attack them 2 additional times. 
If there are no other enemies, attack the original target 1 additional time.
Chinese:
若存在与目标行动倒计时差值为1以内的其他敌人，追加攻击该敌人2次。
若场上无其他敌人，追加攻击原目标1次。

English:
Increase target's standby count by 1. 
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/2):</color> Add 1 additional attack dealing &b damage.
Chinese:
使目标行动倒计时+1。
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/2）：</color>追加1次&b点伤害的攻击。

English:
Cast [Destruction Spell] on a random enemy.
Reduces all allies' Overload by 1. 
Using this skill does not change enemies' standby counts.
Chinese:
对随机敌人释放1次【破坏法术】。
使所有友军过载-1。
使用此技能时不会使敌人的行动倒计时变化。

English:
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/3):</color> Guaranteed Critical. 
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/5):</color> Add 1 [Bond Chain] to the deck.
Chinese:
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/3）：</color>必定暴击。
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/5）：</color>在牌库生成1张【友情连锁】。

English:
For each Mana spent, deal an additional &a damage. 
Restore Mana equal to the cost when cast.
Chinese:
依据支付的费用，每1点费用额外造成&a点伤害。
释放时返还消耗的法力值。

English:
Deal &a <color=purple>Pain damage</color> to self (based on Attack). 
Restore 1 Mana and generate 2 [Bond Combo].
Chinese:
对自身造成&a点<color=purple>痛苦伤害</color>（基于攻击力）。
恢复1点法力值，生成2张【友情合击】。

English:
Draw 1 skill. 
Can be used again this turn. 
Reduces Lucy's Overload by 1.
Chinese:
抽取1个技能。
可于本回合内再次使用。
使露西过载-1。

English:
Draw 1 skill. 
Reduces Lucy's Overload by 1.
Chinese:
抽取1个技能。
使露西过载-1。

English:
Draw 1 skill. 
If used immediately when drawn, can be used 3 times this turn. 
If not used immediately, can be used 2 times this turn. 
Reduces Lucy's Overload by 1.
Chinese:
抽取1个技能。
拿到手中立即使用时，可于本回合内使用3次。
若没有立即使用，则只可于本回合内使用2次。
使露西过载-1。

English:
Draw 2 skills. 
If Grea & Anne are alive, they deal 35% Attack damage 2 times. 
If the target is killed, restore 1 Mana.
Chinese:
抽取2个技能。
若古蕾雅&安存活，由古蕾雅&安造成35%攻击力点伤害2次。
若击杀目标，恢复1点法力值。

English: Generate a Barrier equal to the sum of all enemies' current standby counts.
Chinese: 依据所有敌人当前行动倒计时之和生成防护墙。

English:
Deal &a damage 5 times. 
For every 3 stacks of [Bond Sigil], add 1 additional hit. 
Critical Rate -50% per enemy.
Chinese:
造成&a点伤害5次。
自身每有3层【友情魔印】，额外追加1次。
每有1个敌人，此技能暴击率-50%。

English:
Deal &b damage 3 times. 
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/4):</color> For each charge met, add 1 additional attack dealing &b damage. 
<color=#039551>Charge (&a/6):</color> For each charge met, reduce cost by 1.
Chinese:
造成&b点伤害3次。
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/4）：</color>每满足1倍蓄力，额外追加1次&b点伤害的攻击。
<color=#039551>蓄力（&a/6）：</color>每满足1倍蓄力，费用减少1点。

English: Turn this skill into an Overload skill. Restore 1 Mana when used.
Chinese: 使此技能变为过载技能。使用时，恢复1点法力值。

English: Grants Grea & Anne 2 stacks of "Attack Boost 8%" for 2 turns.
Chinese: 使古蕾雅&安获得2层‘攻击力提升8%’的增益，持续2回合。

English: While holding this skill, gain 1 charge (X) per standby count elapsed (not counted when ending the turn). Triggers effect when charge (X) meets requirement (Y).
Chinese: 此技能握在手中时，每经过1个倒计时（按下回合结束键后不计入），增加1点蓄力值（X）。蓄力值（X）满足要求（Y）时，可触发词条效果。
